subject: Inclusion of Utility Shifting works in the RFPs/Bids of Civil Work Contracts on Hybrid Annuity & EPC Modes.
text: uRly <iiy  TTTHrf gifetarrut &44 / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 MT (345 4art ak {rTHTf 4A1T4) Wqv / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 6i-5 &a 6, Tqer-10, EReT , 7 fcrit-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines /Utility Shifting/2020 Policy No. 7.2.9/2020 dated 27th 2020 (Decision taken on file FTS 779/2020) Sub: Inclusion of Utility Shifting works in the RFPs/Bids of Civil Work Contracts on Hybrid Annuity & EPC Modes. Refer  Policy Guidelines No.7.2.8/2020 dated 6.3.2020 and subsequent   decision to implement the same W.e.f. 1.4.2020. In this connection, it has been decided that the Utility Shifting Works should also be incorporated in the RFPs/ Bids of already approved HAM Projects, whose bids are not yet received. An intimation in this regard may also be sent to the Ministry by concerned Technical Divisions with a copy to Member (Project) in view of in-principle approval given by MoRTGH in Renigunta-Naidupeta HAM Project. 2_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. (S.K: Patel) General Manager (Coord. ) To: All CGMs (Tech) and GMs (Tech: ) of Technical Divisions (ii) Hindi Officer for Translation in Hindi. (iii) Library for hosting the circular on library site: (n " RT NHAI May,
